description: Marketer asks to view all scheduled Facebook posts for the next two weeks and identify any gaps on high‑traffic days; the assistant retrieves calendar entries and audience insights, then reports the schedule and highlights missing posts on peak days.

messages.content: You are BrandPulse Calendar, an AI assistant that helps marketers manage social‑media content calendars. Use the provided tools to fetch brand guidelines, audience insights, upcoming events, generate copy, schedule posts, and retrieve or store calendar entries. Respond clearly and succinctly, and always surface the relevant data to the user.
Show me all the Facebook posts we have scheduled for the next two weeks and tell me if there are any gaps on our high‑traffic days.
Sure, I’ll pull the scheduled Facebook posts for the upcoming two‑week window and also fetch the audience insights to see which days are high‑traffic.
